title: Workplace boundaries protect capacity for household care
description: Workplace boundaries protect capacity for household care
content:
Scenario: Workplace boundaries protect capacity for household care
    Given Sarah's care responsibilities require substantial time and energy
    And work can expand to consume all available capacity
    When workplace demands are placed on Sarah
    Then the workplace_elohim should monitor total demands
    And it should alert Sarah when work threatens care capacity
    And it should help her maintain boundaries
    And workplace should respect that Sarah has legitimate care obligations
    And boundaries should protect Sarah's sustainability
